title: Student-centric Model of Learning Management System Activity and Academic Performance: from Correlation to Causation. (arXiv:2210.15430v3 [cs.CY] UPDATED)
abstract: In recent years, there is a lot of interest in modeling students' digital traces in Learning Management System (LMS) to understand students' learning behavior patterns including aspects of meta-cognition and self-regulation, with the ultimate goal to turn those insights into actionable information to support students to improve their learning outcomes.
